K-DASH Sweaters And Vests

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 5.8/10 (9 votes cast)

K-DASH Sweaters are in style this season. Stay warm in style with these KDASH stylish sweaters. K-DASH is a Kardashian Clothing brand that is exclusive to QVC. Clicking through on any of the KDASH items will take you to the QVC.com K-DASH item directly. Kim, Kourtney, and Kloe all promote K-DASH on the QVC television regularly. These K-DASH sweaters from THE Kardashian Clothing line are the closest you will find online to the sweaters at the DASH Boutiques:

DASH LA – DASH Miami – DASH NYC

D-A-S-H clothing is often featured on the popular television show “Keeping Up With The Kardashians”. K-DASH can help you Keep Up With The Kardashian Fashion.

K-DASH Sweaters

K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Chain Shoulder Detail

Feel locked into the same old look? Perk up your wardrobe with this fun and fabulous sweater! Chain details on the shoulders give the standard style a little edge. From K-DASH.


K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Chain Shoulder Detail



K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Chain Shoulder Detail

K-DASH by Kardashian Pullover Tunic with Drawstring

Casual coziness that’s chic to boot. Done in a longer tunic length, this pullover is semi-fitted to flatter your shape. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Pullover Tunic with Drawstring



K-DASH by Kardashian Pullover Tunic with Drawstring

K-DASH by Kardashian Oversized Cowl Neck Striped Sweater

Casual comfort never looked so chic. This oversized cowl neck striped sweater is a favorite for chilly days that still require sensational style. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Oversized Cowl Neck Striped Sweater



K-DASH by Kardashian Oversized Cowl Neck Striped Sweater

K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Georgette Sleeve

You don’t usually think of sleeves as being the standout feature of a sweater. But these 3/4-length sleeves are done in a fluttery georgette fabric, which makes them an instant eye-catcher. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Georgette Sleeve



K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater with Georgette Sleeve

K-DASH by Kardashian Striped Belted Long Cardigan

Long on style. The picture of casual chic, this luxuriously long sweater is sophisticated with stripes and a self belt. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Striped Belted Long Cardigan



K-DASH by Kardashian Striped Belted Long Cardigan

K-DASH by Kardashian Drape Front Tunic with Cowl Neck

The perfect addition to your cool-weather wardrobe. This drape-front tunic is beautifully fashioned with long sleeves and a cowl neckline. Paired with your favorite skinny jeans or an adorable skirt, the super-chic top is sure to catch the eye of more than one admirer. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Drape Front Tunic with Cowl Neck



K-DASH by Kardashian Drape Front Tunic with Cowl Neck

K-DASH Vests

K-DASH by Kardashian Double Breasted Faux Fur Vest

The wilds of your winter might just be the city streets, but that doesn’t mean you can’t wear some faux fur! This double-breasted vest keeps you nice and toasty with a faux-fur collar and a full faux-fur inside. An asymmetrical hem adds a final trendy touch. From K-DASH.


K-DASH by Kardashian Double Breasted Faux Fur Vest



K-DASH by Kardashian Double Breasted Faux Fur Vest

K-DASH by Kardashian Cascade Sequin Vest

This isn’t your mama’s vest. Not only is it encrusted with dazzling, allover sequins, this vest has a cascade silhouette that drapes in the front, plus an asymmetrical hemline. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Cascade Sequin Vest



K-DASH by Kardashian Cascade Sequin Vest

K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater Vest w/ Faux Fur & Removable Belt

On-trend with the season’s hottest looks, this chic sweater vest gets it right on every level. First, it’s made from a figure-flattering acrylic that allows you to create a layered appearance without the added bulk. Plus, it’s got faux fur trim and a removable faux leather belt for ultra-feminine style. Two front pockets and ribbing detail at the hem finish off the smart, fashion-forward design. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater Vest w/ Faux Fur & Removable Belt



K-DASH by Kardashian Sweater Vest w/ Faux Fur &Removable Belt

K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Cargo Vest

Even cargo looks sexy in this one-button vest. Fashionably fitted, it trims the look of your waistline, and can be worn in so many ways–with jeans, ankle-length pants, or slim capris. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Cargo Vest



K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Cargo Vest

K-DASH by Kardashian Metallic Boyfriend Cardigan

Who says cardigans have to be basic? This long-sleeved, metallic boyfriend cardigan radiates with trendy style. It’s a hip, modern take on a longtime favorite that will easily transition from day to night. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Metallic Boyfriend Cardigan



K-DASH by Kardashian Metallic Boyfriend Cardigan
